laboratory_examinations.findings: Single-nucleotide variants (SNVs) and InDels were called using Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) and annotated with Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor. Variants were filtered using multiple databases and annotated according to ACMG guidelines.
MKS1 mutations were validated in the aborted fetuses and the couple.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Preimplantation Genetic Testing for Monogenic Disorders (PGT-M)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Whole-genome amplification of each embryo biopsy sample was performed using the MALBAC WGA kit. A total of 60 single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) markers linked to the mutation alleles were selected for linkage analysis.
